Row.Text: There will be two common land military units produced in cities instead of one. [NEWLINE]Your builders +2[ICON_Charges], you can consume [ICON_Charges] to advance the construction progress of the area by 25%, feature units and settlers and builders +1[ICON_Movement]. [NEWLINE]Cities with feature buildings +50%[ICON_GreatPerson]. When the total number of special buildings reaches 12, all units will be greatly strengthened. [NEWLINE]Districts are built regardless of population, and each district will have +4[ICON_Production].
There will be two land military units produced, and the construction of the area ignores the population.

城市生产的通常型陆地军事单位会出现两个，而不是一个。[NEWLINE]你的建造者+2[ICON_Charges]，可以消耗[ICON_Charges]推进区域25%的建造进度，并且特色单位和开拓者和建造者+1[ICON_Movement]。[NEWLINE]拥有特色建筑的城市+50%[ICON_GreatPerson]，当特色建筑总数量达到12时，所有单位会得到大幅度的强化。[NEWLINE]区域的建造无视人口，每个区域都会+4[ICON_Production]。

城市生產的通常型陸地軍事單位會出現兩個，而不是一個。 [NEWLINE]你的建造者+2[ICON_Charges]，可以消耗[ICON_Charges]推進區域25%的建造進度，並且特色單位和開拓者和建造者+1[ICON_Movement]。 [NEWLINE]擁有特色建築的城市+50%[ICON_GreatPerson]，當特色建築總數量達到12時，所有單位會得到大幅度的強化。 [NEWLINE]區域的建造無視人口，每個區域都會+4[ICON_Production]。
